abstract: The incidence of malignant melanoma has increased dramatically in recent decades. Although curable if caught early, malignant melanoma often presents a diagnostic challenge. This article discusses modalities for identifying malignant melanoma, including four techniques used in skin examinations: (1) ABCD method, (2) total-body photography, (3) skin surface microscopy, and (4) machine vision.
title: How to diagnose malignant melanoma.
